ACCOUNT.CURRENT_PLAN_LABEL_FREE: You are on the Free plan
ACCOUNT.CURRENT_PLAN_LABEL_PRO: You are on the PRO plan

CHANGE_PASSWORD_MODAL.INTRO: Change password here. Fill out form below.
CHANGE_PASSWORD_MODAL.TITLE: Change Password

CHOOSEADDRESS.NOT_VALID_DOMAIN: Special characters and spaces cannot be used in a domain name.
CHOOSEADDRESS.TITLE: Congratulations, your website has been created

COMMENTS_MANAGE.BLOCKED_TIP: Do you want to block users from writing comments on your website?
COMMENTS_MANAGE.INTRO2_TIP: Do you want to change settings for your comments?
COMMENTS_MANAGE.INTRO_TIP: Tip: You can easily delete unwanted comments from your website. If you want to ban a certain visitor from writing comments, just click delete and block.
COMMENTS_MANAGE.INTRO_TITLE: You can manage your website comments on this page.
COMMENTS_MANAGE.NO_COMMENTS: You don't have any comments yet.

COMMENTS_SETTINGS.APPROVE_SUBTITLE: You can choose to approve comments before they are posted on your website.
COMMENTS_SETTINGS.EMAIL_SUBTITLE: Would you like an email notification when you receive a comment on your site?
COMMENTS_SETTINGS.SHOW_COMMENTS_SUBTITLE: You can control which pages show comments. It's easy to enable comments for your entire site.
COMMENTS_SETTINGS.TITLE: @:BASE.V3.COMMENTS_TITLE

DEFAULT_TEXT_IN_TEXTSECTION.HEADLINE: I'm a paragraph heading
DEFAULT_TEXT_IN_TEXTSECTION.TEXT: I'm a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. I'm a great place for you to tell your story and let your visitors know a little more about you.

DESIGN_EDITOR.GO_PRO_BACKGROUNDS_MESSAGE: Upgrade to pro to use this background

DOMAINBAR.DOMAIN_STATUS_TEXT: Your domain has been purchased but not yet activated.
DOMAINBAR.DOMAIN_STATUS_TEXT_24: You have purchased the domain less than 24 hours ago.
DOMAINBAR.DOMAIN_STATUS_TEXT_24-48: You have purchased the domain between 24 and 48 hours ago.
DOMAINBAR.DOMAIN_STATUS_TEXT_48-76: You have purchased the domain between 48 and 76 hours ago.
DOMAINBAR.DOMAIN_STATUS_TEXT_76: You have purchased the domain more than 76 hours ago.

HINT.ADD_CONTENT: Right now your website is almost empty. Luckily, it's very easy to change that. Click the red '+' button whenever you want to add new content to your site. To edit content that's already there, just click on it to make your changes.
HINT.GETHELP: Finally, click here if you get stuck, or need our help. It's always here, whenever you need it.
HINT.HIDEPREVIEW: Right now, you're in the website preview. Here, you can inspect what your website will look like to your visitors. To return and continue editing your website, simply click 'edit website'
HINT.PREVIEW: Want to preview your changes? Click here, to use the preview to see how your website will look to your visitors. It's easy to go back and forth between preview and edit.

MAXPAGE_MODAL.EXPLANATION: Your basic subscription allows space for 15 pages.
MAXPAGE_MODAL.FEATURELIST_01: Your own domain name for FREE
MAXPAGE_MODAL.PROPITCH_02: In order to add more pages, upgrade now and get full access to all the great PRO features including your own domain name.
MAXPAGE_MODAL.TITLE: You ran out of pages

NEW_PAGE_MODAL.ABOUT_US_TEXT: Say something about yourself, your business or your organization
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.ADDRESS_PAGE_TEXT: Add your contact information for people to get in touch
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.BLOG_TEXT: Write about your opinions, activities, and experiences
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.CONTACT_ME_TEXT: Add your contact page for people to get in touch via email
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.GUESTBOOK_PAGE_TEXT: Give your visitors a place to leave you messages
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.MY_PROJECT_TEXT: Let the world know what you're working on, or show off work that you've already completed
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.PEOPLE_GALLERY_TEXT: Who are the key people behind your operation? Showcase them here to add a human touch to your website
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.PHOTO_ALBUM_TEXT: Add images and share your visual stories
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.PHOTO_STORY_TEXT: A picture is worth a thousand words. Use images to tell a story that can’t be told using text alone
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.SERVICE_LIST_TEXT: Tell your visitors about the services you offer. Include prices, descriptions and images so they can easily compare
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.STANDARD_PAGE_TEXT: Create a page just the way you want it
NEW_PAGE_MODAL.TITLE: Add new page

ADD_IMAGE_MODAL.TIP: Tip: You can filter the images by selecting a category
ADD_IMAGE_MODAL.TITLE: Select Image

COLUMNS_SECTION.MODAL_LINK_LABEL: What should the title link to?

COMMENTS_BOX.INFOTEXT1: This is the comment section for this page. Here, your visitors can leave comments on your website.
COMMENTS_BOX.INFOTEXT2: Comments are a great way to get feedback from your visitors. Unlike email, comments are not just visible to you, but to other visitors as well.
COMMENTS_BOX.INFOTEXT3: Go to your [livewebsite] or your comment settings in the '[@:HOME.MAINMENU.ACCOUNT]' tab to see what comments your visitors have already left. You can also review and delete comments in these settings, and choose to turn comments on or off for individual pages on your website.
COMMENTS_BOX.INFOTEXT_TEASER: This is the comment section for this page. Here, your visitors can leave comments on your website.
COMMENTS_BOX.TITLE: @:BASE.V3.COMMENTS_BOX_TITLE

CONTACT_ME.FORM_HEADLINE: Write your message here. Fill out the form:
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT1: This is a Contact Page. This page allows your visitors to send you an email to get in touch with you.
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT2: Make sure to write a short message for your visitors at the top of the page. Before they write you, your visitors often need to know
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT3: What should they write you about?
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT4: How long do you normally take to respond?
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT5: What other ways are there to get in contact with you (e.g. phone or social media)?
CONTACT_ME.INFOTEXT_TEASER: This page is a Contact Page. This page allows your visitors to send you an email. The email will go directly to your email inbox, so you can respond to it immediately.

CREATE.TEXT: We’re using this space for a small SimpleSite ad so your website can stay completely free.
CREATE.TITLE: Your website is free

DELETE_MODAL.IS_EMPTY: This section is empty. If you continue, the section will be deleted. Do you want to delete the section?
DELETE_MODAL.REALLY: Delete this content from your page?

FREEMIUM.LINK: Get your own FREE website. Click here!
FREEMIUM.TEXT: This website was created with SimpleSite

CTA_OPTIONS.CTA_LINK_LABEL: What should the button link to?
CTA_OPTIONS.CTA_TEXT_LABEL: What should the button say? (Examples: ‘Read more’, ‘Contact us  now’)
CTA_OPTIONS.INVALID_LINK: You should specify which page should be shown when users click the button.
CTA_OPTIONS.INVALID_TEXT: You should specify a text for the button. Having a button with no text makes less sense to your users.
CTA_OPTIONS.TITLE: Button settings

HERO_SECTION.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: I'm a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. I'm a great place for you to tell your story and let your visitors know a little more about you.

NEWS_SECTION.LINK_LABEL: Link this news to a page

PHOTO_ALBUM.FILE_NOT_UPLOADED: One of your files was not uploaded

SELECT_IMAGE_MODAL.TITLE: Select the image that you want to use

SHARE.MAIL_BODY: I've just updated my website at [livewebsite]

SLIDESHOW_SECTION.ERR_FINISH_EDITING: Finish editing or uploading current image!

SS_IMAGE.CAPTION: Caption
SS_IMAGE.WRONG_FILETYPE: Incorrect file format. Please upload an image file.

UPGRADE_TO_PRO_MODAL.UPGRADE_TO_PRO_DIMMED_TEXT: You are trying to save PRO features
UPGRADE_TO_PRO_MODAL.UPGRADE_TO_PRO_TEXT_1: PRO features, like the one you've just selected, are only available in SimpleSite PRO.
UPGRADE_TO_PRO_MODAL.UPGRADE_TO_PRO_TEXT_2: SimpleSite PRO offers more design features and removes all SimpleSite ads and branding from your website. You can also have your own personal domain name with SimpleSite PRO.
UPGRADE_TO_PRO_MODAL.UPGRADE_TO_PRO_TEXT_3: Try SimpleSite PRO for free for 14 days, with absolutely no commitment.

VIDEO_SECTION.NO_URL_IN_EXTERNAL_INPUT: No URL entered. Please enter a YouTube or Vimeo URL.
VIDEO_SECTION.PROCESSING_VIDEO: We are processing your video. You will be able to view your video clip in a few moments.
VIDEO_SECTION.WRONG_FILETYPE: Unsupported file format. Please upload a video file.
VIDEO_SECTION.WRONG_URL: Incorrect URL. Please enter a YouTube or Vimeo URL.

TEST_OR_EDIT.TITLE: What would you like to do next?

COLUMNS.TEXT: You are adding “Columns” to your website. Please note that columns are shown only on the desktop version of your website. On mobile they will be presented as one column.
COLUMNS.TITLE: Add columns

NEWS.TEXT: News is for you to write your latest news or updates on your website.
NEWS.TITLE: Add news

REMOVEADSPLASH.COPY: We show SimpleSite ads so your free website and its features can remain free. If you want to remove ads, you can upgrade to our PRO subscription. Your SimpleSite can be entirely ad-free for only [_price_] for the first month.

HOME.TOO_LONG_INPUT: Your page title can only be up to 20 characters long. Please try a shorter title.

WELCOME.BODYTEXT2: Your website is now ready and online. We've customized your site for you to have the best start online.
WELCOME.BODYTEXT3: Your website has the following pages:
WELCOME.BODYTEXT4: You can add content, edit the design and update your site as much as you want.
WELCOME.HEADER: Welcome to SimpleSite. You're all set!
